results.overview: MTV ao vivo é o sexto álbum e primeiro trabalho ao vivo da banda brasileira de Hardcore Punk Raimundos, lançado em 2000. Foi também o primeiro álbum da série MTV ao Vivo. Gravado em oito shows da turnê Só no Forévis nas cidades de São Paulo e Curitiba, o álbum é um apanhado geral da carreira da banda, devido a seu vasto repertório formado por sucessos como "Mulher de Fases", "Tora-Tora", "Puteiro em João Pessoa", "Papeau Nuky Doe" (única canção oriunda do álbum especial Cesta Básica), "Eu Quero Ver o Oco", "Andar na Pedra" e "Esporrei na Manivela", além da inédita "Reggae do Manero". Como faixa-bônus, o CD inclui uma regravação em estúdio de "20 e Poucos Anos", sucesso do cantor romântico Fábio Jr.. Foi o último trabalho da banda com o vocalista Rodolfo Abrantes.
results.title: Raimundos - MTV ao Vivo

results.original_title: Varg Veum - I mørket er alle ulver grå
results.overview: Varg Veum investigates a case where his good friend Even, a highly decorated ex-army officer, is falsely accused of bombing Armakon, a weapons storage facility.
results.title: Varg Veum - At Night All Wolves Are Grey

results.overview: The Marx Brothers are employed at a hotel in postwar Casablanca, where a ring of Nazis is trying to recover a cache of stolen treasure.
results.title: A Night in Casablanca

results.overview: A woman reclaims an offensive song and joyfully dances through London as she frees herself of the shackles of prejudice.
results.title: I Am The Impossible

results.original_title: Fallen Angels Murder Club: Friends to Die For
results.overview: The members of the Fallen Angels Murder Club must have two things in common — a love for books and have a criminal record. Hollis Morgan meets both requirements. When a member of her book club is murdered in a scene straight out of the previous night’s novel, Hollis becomes the subject of police scrutiny. Refusing to get stuck with another bad rap, Hollis sets out to investigate her fellow club members and after a second book-inspired murder, she races to identify the killer before she becomes the next victim.
results.title: Fallen Angels Murder Club: Friends to Die For

results.overview: After leaving work a woman goes home unaware of a sinister presence following her.
results.title: Alone

results.original_title: クレヨンしんちゃん ヘンダーランドの大冒険
results.overview: The Futaba Kindergarten kids are so excited for their trip to the Henderland amusement park, but Shin-chan soon learns there are evil forces at play!
results.title: Crayon Shin-chan: Great Adventure In Henderland

results.overview: In Paris, two dysfunctional dealers use family ties to try to boost their small drug business in this crass comedy based on the webseries.
results.title: The Misadventures of Hedi and Cokeman

results.overview: To pull off a spectacular Christmas-themed wedding, a wedding planner joins forces with the co-owner of a family-run Christmas decoration and house-lighting company.
results.title: Twinkle All the Way

results.overview: Asher is a former Mossad agent turned gun for hire, living an austere life in an ever-changing Brooklyn. Approaching the end of his career, he breaks the oath he took as a young man when he meets Sophie on a hit gone wrong. In order to have love in his life before it's too late, he must kill the man he was, for a chance at becoming the man he wants to be.
results.title: Asher

results.overview: Two inept criminals are mistakenly delivered a package of cocaine and think they've hit the jackpot, triggering a series of events that changes ten people's lives forever.
results.title: Next Day Air

results.overview: When tragedy rocks Blackfoot High, rebellious outsider Mäddy Killian shocks the student body by joining the cheerleading squad. After a confrontation with the football team, Mäddy and her new cheerleader friends are sent on a supernatural roller coaster ride which leaves a path of destruction none of them may be able to escape.
results.title: All Cheerleaders Die

results.overview: Giovanni, a married man with a child, meets on a train Maria, a former lover.
results.title: An Italian Romance

results.overview: Lovesick Charlie Brown hopes – still – to get a valentine from the Little Red-Haired Girl, as does Sally from Linus, Lucy from Schroeder and Peppermint Patty from Charlie Brown.
results.title: A Charlie Brown Valentine

results.overview: The rigid principles of a devout Catholic man are challenged during a one-night stay with Maud, a divorced woman with an outsize personality.
results.title: My Night at Maud's

results.overview: In this documentary, Ilary Blasi shares the emotional and powerful story of the much-discussed end of her marriage.
results.title: Ilary Blasi: The One and Only

results.overview: A young lawyer's murder rocks Aigues-Mortes and triggers the re-opening of a cold case.
results.title: Murder In Aigues-Mortes

results.overview: Two highway road workers spend the summer of 1988 away from their city lives. The isolated landscape becomes a place of misadventure as the men find themselves at odds with each other and the women they left behind.
results.title: Prince Avalanche

results.overview: Scooby-Doo and Shaggy travel to Arabia to become the Caliph's Royal Food Tasters. But they bite off more than they can chew and are forced to run for their lives! It's a wild magic carpet ride as Scooby-Doo, Shaggy and their genie (Yogi Bear) and a jolly sailor named Sinbad (Magilla Gorilla) take you on an adventure of mistaken identities, exotic locations and fun-filled action and surprises!
results.title: Scooby-Doo! in Arabian Nights

results.overview: Young-goon, mentally deranged and frequently electro-charging herself with a transistor radio, has been admitted into a mental institution. Firmly believing herself to be a cyborg, she refuses to consume like a human being. Il-soon is another patient, who catches the eye of Young-goon and soon becomes a close friend. Il-soon is now confronted with the biggest task: to cure Young-goon's mental problem and have her eat real food.
results.title: I'm a Cyborg, but That's OK
